pages.title: Creating Company
pages.text: This Ritual Table is swirling with energy, both peaceful and malicious. You should be able to use this to restore some of the creatures that were lost to the void. Let's keep it simple to start with - Conjure some livestock, a $(item)Cow$() for example. You may require an approximation of its flesh and bones to accomplish this, but surely you can figure that out.

pages.heading: Conjure Cow
pages.description: Summon a Cow at the Ritual Altar

pages.heading: Conjure Skeleton
pages.description: Summon a Skeleton at the Ritual Altar to get whole bones

pages.heading: Raw Beef
pages.description: Requires at least 4 buckets of Liquid Mana
